          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrogen bonding between water molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasserstoffabbinden zwischen Wassermolekülen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Liaison d'hydrogène entre les molécules d'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ligação do hidrogênio entre moléculas de 
água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Bonding dell'idrogeno fra le molecole di acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύνδεση υδρογόνου μεταξύ των μορίων ύδατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vinculación del hidrógeno entre las moléculas 
de agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the hydrogen bonds formed between hydrogen atom of one water molecule and oxygen atom of another.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoms</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen bonding</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen bonds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lone-pair</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Wasserstoffbindungen, 
die zwischen Wasserstoffatom von einem Wassermolekül und 
Sauerstoffatom von anderen gebildet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les obligations 
d'hydrogène formées entre l'atome d'hydrogène d'une molécule d'eau
et l'atome d'oxygène des autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as ligações do 
hidrogênio dadas forma entre um átomo do hidrogênio de uma 
molécula de água e um átomo de oxigênio de outra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i legami 
dell'idrogeno formati fra un atomo dell'idrogeno di una molecola di 
acqua e l'atomo di ossigeno di un altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δεσμούς υδρογόνου που 
διαμορφώνονται μεταξύ του ατόμου υδρογόνου ενός μορίου ύδατος 
και του ατόμου οξυγόνου άλλο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los enlaces del 
hidrógeno formados entre el átomo del hidrógeno de una molécula de
agua y el átomo de oxígeno de otra.</string>
          </description>
